name: Kill the Pixels
description:
Kill the Pixels is a game created by Douglas Tavares, Rafael Cezzaroni, Guilherme Januario and Victor Oliveira, or also know as the Stillfrag-Team (incopleted). And the game was made during the one-week period for the American Fatec Gaminp Game Jam.


What is the game about?

The game is about a character who after losing a "pixel", needs to get this "pixel" back. And you will be responsible for controlling it during this rescue.


Okay, but I want to know, what is the gameplay of the game?

The game is a side-scroller, platformer, 2D, shooter, with some customizations, and dialogs.
